articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Greta Gerwig makes history as Barbie has biggest opening weekend for film directed by a woman - The Guardian
articles.description: Barbie made $377m while Christopher Nolan’s Oppenheimer took home $174m, making ‘Barbenheimer’ biggest box office weekend of 2023 so far
articles.content:
Greta Gerwig has made history as Barbie scored a US$377m (£293m, A$560m) opening weekend around the world, making it the biggest debut ever for a film directed by a woman.
At the North American box … [+2984 chars]

articles.author: James Reinl
articles.title: EXCLUSIVE: Trans surgery nightmares revealed: 81% endure pain in the five years after gender-change procedures, more than half say having sex is painful - and a third are left incontinent, survey shows - Daily Mail
articles.description: University of Florida researchers showed that more than half of trans surgery patients endured pain during sex, and nearly a third could not control their bladders after operations.
articles.content: One of the first studies into the side effects of transgender surgeries has revealed alarmingly high rates of post-op pain, aching during intercourse, and bladder problems, raising troubling question… [+5597 chars]

articles.author: James Hibbs
articles.title: Oppenheimer fans spot historical error in Christopher Nolan epic - Radio Times
articles.description: It's a minor detail but eagle-eyed fans of the historical epic have already been calling it out.
articles.content:
In a scene set in 1945, Cillian Murphy's J. Robert Oppenheimer is surrounded by a crowd waving hand-held American flags.
The problem is that the flag is the current version, featuring 50 stars to re… [+1817 chars]
